title: Lets get to silver boys
body:
**For all those unranked people that have to deal with the trolls and afk'ers lets make a team were we all work together ban the right champs and win some games.**
I play {{champion:254}} Vi jungle and some champs top i also play {{champion:236}} Lucian and {{champion:67}} Vayne bot i am not great at mid or support
1.  first no trollers 
2. plz be good at the lane ur in and always help your jungler
3. Warding is a must 
4. Teamwork and no negative attitude
5.  writer gg plz and dont bully ur enemy
thxs send me friend requests if ur interested. 
THX ALL :)
also write in the comments so i know who u are
